TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DataGridTemplateColumn extends System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 表示將樣板指定的內容裝載於其儲存格中的 資料行。

span.span: Represents a column that hosts template-specified content in its cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類型可讓您指定顯示和編輯值時使用的儲存格範本來建立您自己的資料行類型。The type enables you to create your own column types by specifying the cell templates to use when displaying and editing values. 指定用來顯示不是處於編輯模式之儲存格內容的範本，請設定屬性。To specify the template that is used to display the contents of a cell that is not in editing mode, set the property. 指定用來顯示處於編輯模式之儲存格內容的範本，請設定屬性。To specify the template that is used to display the contents of a cell that is in editing mode, set the property. 如需有關範本的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)並[樣式和範本化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information about templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md) and [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). 為了方便起見，提供下列預先定義的資料行類型：For convenience, provides the following pre-defined column types: |資料行型別Column Type|資料顯示Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| ||若要顯示的 URI 資料的使用。Use to display URI data.| ||使用此選項，來顯示列舉型別資料。Use to display enumeration data.| ||使用此選項，來顯示文字。Use to display text.| ||使用此選項，來顯示布林值的資料。Use to display Boolean data.| ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立 。The following example shows how to create a . [!code-xaml[DataGrid_TemplateColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_templatecolumn/CS/window1.xaml#1)] 下圖顯示輸出，從先前的 XAML。The following illustration shows the output from the previous XAML. ![使用 DataTemplate 的資料行](~/add/media/ndp-wpf-templatecolumn.png "使用 DataTemplate 的資料行")![A column using a DataTemplate](~/add/media/ndp-wpf-templatecolumn.png "A column using a DataTemplate")

summary.span: 取得或設定範本，這個範本要用來顯示編輯模式下之儲存格的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the template to use to display the contents of a cell that is in editing mode.

value.span: 用於顯示編輯模式下儲存格之內容的樣板。

span.span: The template that is used to display the contents of a cell that is in editing mode.
The registered default is .

value.span: 如需哪些因素會影響值的詳細資訊，請參閱 。

span.span: For information about what can influence the value, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編輯範本的資料格定義的內容中的資料行儲存格處於編輯模式時的顯示方式。The cell editing template defines how the content is displayed in the column cells when in editing mode. 如需有關資料範本的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)並[樣式和範本化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information about data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md) and [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). 若要定義之儲存格不是處於編輯模式的範本，請使用。To define the template for the cell that is not in editing mode, use the . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立來顯示和編輯日期資料行。The following example shows how to create the for displaying and editing a column of dates. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_TemplateColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_templatecolumn/CS/window1.xaml#1)] 下圖顯示輸出，從先前的 XAML。The following illustration shows the output from the previous XAML. ![使用 DataTemplate 的資料行](~/add/media/ndp-wpf-templatecolumn.png "使用 DataTemplate 的資料行")![A column using a DataTemplate](~/add/media/ndp-wpf-templatecolumn.png "A column using a DataTemplate")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存格樣板定義的內容中的資料行儲存格的顯示方式。The cell template defines how the content is displayed in the column cells. 如需有關資料範本的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)並[樣式和範本化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information about data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md) and [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). 若要定義的儲存格處於編輯模式的範本，請使用。To define the template for a cell that is in editing mode, use the . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立來顯示日期資料行。The following example shows how to create the for displaying a column of dates. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_TemplateColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_templatecolumn/CS/window1.xaml#1)] 下圖顯示輸出，從先前的 XAML。The following illustration shows the output from the previous XAML. ![使用 DataTemplate 的資料行](~/add/media/ndp-wpf-templatecolumn.png "使用 DataTemplate 的資料行")![A column using a DataTemplate](~/add/media/ndp-wpf-templatecolumn.png "A column using a DataTemplate")
